summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from February 1 to February 28, 2015. It details the account balance, deposits, withdrawals, and interest earned during this period, highlighting significant transactions including a transfer to Silicon Valley Bank.

persons.name: Mande Kirby
persons.context: Mande Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $300,000.00 was made from the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $900,000.00 to Silicon Valley Bank was recorded.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $59,984.96 was credited to the account.

keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of February 2015 was $587,609,592.10.
The ending balance as of February 28, 2015, was $586,419,577.06.
A total of $1,200,000.00 was debited from the account during February 2015.
The account earned an interest of $9,984.96 during the statement period.
Mande Kirby is the contact person for inquiries related to the account.
